Name: Loyal Customer
ShortDescription: Ths extension changes the customer to a loyal customer when certain criteria are met.
Description: The purpose for this extesion is to recorginize loyal customer, and place them into a special customer group. This customer group can then be used to send special newsletter, have special offers and much more.
Author: Dennis Zweijtzer
metaDescription: customergroup change to loyalty programs, loyal customer
profile: This is a sample extensions, created by IncraShop itself.
